scripts.dev: ENV=dev concurrently "npm run dev:api" "SERVICE=default PORT=3000 npm run dev:service" "SERVICE=service1 PORT=3001 npm run dev:service" "SERVICE=service2 PORT=3002 npm run dev:service"
scripts.deploy: SERVICE=default npm run deploy:service && SERVICE=service1 npm run deploy:service && SERVICE=service2 npm run deploy:service && npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:dispatch
scripts.deploy:service: npm run deploy:service:prep && YAML=services/${SERVICE}/app.yaml npm run deploy:gcloud && npm run deploy:service:cleanup
scripts.deploy:service:prep: rm -f -r .nuxt services/${SERVICE}/.nuxt && npm run build:service && mv .nuxt services/${SERVICE} && cpx nuxt.global.js services/${SERVICE} && cpx package.json services/${SERVICE}
scripts.deploy:api: cpx config.json services/api && YAML=services/api/app.yaml npm run deploy:gcloud && rm -f services/api/config.json
scripts.start:service: npm run build:service && cpx nuxt.global.js services/${SERVICE} && cpx package.json services/${SERVICE} && cd services/${SERVICE} && npm i && npm run start && cd -
